TextEng: Of course. Follow me.
Find it on your own. I don't have time to baby-sit.
Text: 혼자 찾아. 애 보는 데 쓸 시간 없어.

TextEng: You aren't going anywhere. Time to die!
Text: 넌 아무 데도 못 가. 죽을 시간이야!

TextEng: The exit? Haven't you sworn allegiance to me?
You'll pay for this with your life, fool!
Text: 목숨으로 대가를 치르게 될 거야, 바보!

TextEng: Start running... I don't want to see you ever again!
Text: 빨리 도망쳐... 다시는 보고 싶지 않아!

TextEng: No, you *will* serve me. As promised.
Text: 아니, 넌 나를 섬겨야 해. 약속한 대로.

TextEng: Oh, forget it, then. It wasn't even worth it.
Text: 아, 그럼 됐어. 그럴 가치도 없었어.

TextEng: Fine. Follow me.
You *are* joking, right?
Don't you think it's time you told me who you really are?
Text: 이제 진짜 누군지 말해야 할 때 아니야?

TextEng: Well, you're free now. Find your own way home.
Text: 뭐, 이제 자유야. 알아서 집에 가.

TextEng: Then I suppose I have to kill you now.
Good to know. Now hand over the promissory note.
Text: 잘 알았어. 이제 약속 어음을 내놔.

TextEng: True... fine, keep it then.
We'll see about that.
Now that sounds more like the truth.
A smith in Hilltop?
First there's the matter of that promissory note.
Text: 먼저 그 약속 어음 문제가 있어.

TextEng: First there's the matter of that promissory note.
Text: 먼저 그 약속 어음 문제가 있어.

TextEng: Forget it. I've got other things to do.
Hold on, I'll see what I can do.
Text: 잠깐, 뭘 할 수 있는지 볼게.

TextEng: I can't let you out. The gnolls will get angry if I do.
Text: 풀어줄 수 없어. 그러면 놀들이 화낼 거야.

TextEng: It may be dangerous, but I'll do what I can.
Text: 위험할 수 있지만, 할 수 있는 건 해볼게.

TextEng: If I had some guarantee your father would pay...
Text: 네 아버지가 돈을 낸다는 보장만 있으면...

TextEng: I'll speak to the chieftain on your behalf.
Give me one good reason I should let you out.
Text: 널 풀어줘야 할 이유를 하나만 대봐.

TextEng: First tell me who you are.
In that case, you can stay in the cage.
Oh really? The Baron's son, you say?
And just how do I make sure I get my money?
Text: 내가 돈을 받을 수 있다는 걸 어떻게 알아?

TextEng: Now that does sound promising.
No, I don't think so. Have a nice stay.
Text: 아니, 안 될 것 같아. 잘 있어.

TextEng: Let you out? After all that lying?
Start writing that note and I'll see what I can do.
Text: 어음을 쓰기 시작해. 뭘 할 수 있는지 볼게.

TextEng: So you're trying to cheat me!
So I give it to the non-existent Baron of Hilltop.
Text: 그래서 존재하지도 않는 힐탑 남작에게 주라고.

TextEng: I'm sure I could get more money than *that*.
Text: 그보다 더 많이 받을 수 있을 것 같은데.

TextEng: I suppose two thousand gold will have to do.
Why stop there? Why not keep lying?
Text: 왜 거기서 멈춰? 계속 거짓말하지 그래?

TextEng: Alright, what are you hiding? Do I have to beat it out of you?
Text: 좋아, 뭘 숨기는 거야? 두들겨 패서 알아내야겠어?

TextEng: Even I can see through that act.
Do I look that stupid to you?
Tell me who you really are before I start poking you with sharp objects.
Text: 뾰족한 걸로 찌르기 전에 네가 진짜 누군지 말해.

TextEng: But there is no Baron of Hilltop.
In that case, you can stay in the cage.
Now that sounds more like the truth.
A smith in Hilltop?
How about swearing everlasting loyalty to me?
Text: 나에게 영원한 충성을 맹세하는 건 어때?

TextEng: Hmmm... no, not worth it. You stay in there.
Text: 흠... 아니, 그럴 가치가 없어. 거기 있어.

TextEng: That's better. I'll see what I can do.
Text: 그게 낫지. 뭘 할 수 있는지 볼게.

TextEng: Everything's fine. Never mind.
Follow me again.
Wait here for now.
You're going to have to find your own way out from here.
